channel.description: Current headlines from the Dallas Times-Herald newspaper
channel.title: Dallas Times-Herald

item.author: jbb@dallas.example.com (Joe Bob Briggs)
item.description: I'm headed for France. I wasn't gonna go this year, but then last week "Valley Girl" came out and I said to myself, Joe Bob, you gotta get out of the country for a while.
item.title: Joe Bob Goes to the Drive-In
